description:
The Witch of Yore reveals herself at last, and her miasma threatens to swallow Lieselotte. Will the gang manage to defeat the Witch of Yore through the power of love?
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Majo to Megami to Hajimari no Shinwa
The Witch, the Goddess, and the Creation Myth
魔女と女神と始まりの神話
